section.p: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g. splenectomy). This clinical statement represents procedures that result in new information about the patient that cannot be classified as a procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these procedures are diagnostic imaging procedures, EEGs and EKGs.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 MoodCodeEvnInt STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8237)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 ProcedureActStatusCode DYNAMIC (CONF:8245)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:8368)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8246)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:8247)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 Body Site Value Set STATIC 2
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8251)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] serviceDeliveryLocation (CONF:8263)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] procedureEncounter (CONF:8264)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] instructions (CONF:8275)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:8278)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] medicationActivity (CONF:8281)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD9 Procedures (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:8241)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8242)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:8243)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8244)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:8249)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8262)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8274)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 MoodCodeEvnInt STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8237)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 ProcedureActStatusCode DYNAMIC (CONF:8245)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8246)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:8247)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:8368)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 Body Site Value Set STATIC 2
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8251)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] serviceDeliveryLocation (CONF:8263)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] procedureEncounter (CONF:8264)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] instructions (CONF:8275)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:8278)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] medicationActivity (CONF:8281)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD9 Procedures (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:8241)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8242)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:8243)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8244)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:8249)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8262)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8274)
